44 static const double DEFAULT_CAR_WHEELBASE = 0.25;
45 static const double DEFAULT_LOOP_RATE =
46  100.0;
47 static const std::string DEFAULT_ODOM_FRAME_ID =
48  "odom";
49 static const std::string DEFAULT_ODOM_CHILD_FRAME_ID =
50  "base_footprint";
51 static const std::string DEFAULT_MOTION_COMMAND_TOPIC =
52  "cmd_vel";

54  "/uc_bridge/set_steering_level_msg";

57  "/uc_bridge/set_motor_level_msg";

62  "/uc_bridge/imu";
69 void fetchWheelBase(ros::NodeHandle* nh, double& wheelBase)
70 {
71  if (nh->hasParam("odom_sim/wheel_base"))
72  {
73  nh->getParam("odom_sim/wheel_base", wheelBase);
74  }
75  else
76  {
77  wheelBase = DEFAULT_CAR_WHEELBASE;
78  }
79 }
85 void fetchLoopRate(ros::NodeHandle* nh, double& loopRate)
86 {
87  if (nh->hasParam("odom_sim/loop_rate_control"))
88  {
89  nh->getParam("odom_sim/loop_rate_control", loopRate);
90  }
91  else
92  {
93  loopRate = DEFAULT_LOOP_RATE;
94  }
95 }
101 void fetchOdomFrameID(ros::NodeHandle* nh, std::string& odomFrameID)

221 void motionCommand(const twist_msg::ConstPtr& cmdIn, twist_msg* cmdOut,
222  bool* isTwistCmd)
223 {
224  *cmdOut = *cmdIn;
225  *isTwistCmd = true;
226 }
234 void steeringCommand(const int16_msg::ConstPtr& cmdIn, int* cmdOut,
235  bool* isTwistCmd)
236 {
237  *cmdOut = cmdIn->data;
238  *isTwistCmd = false;
239 }
247 void motorCommand(const int16_msg::ConstPtr& cmdIn, int* cmdOut,
248  bool* isTwistCmd)
249 {
250  *cmdOut = cmdIn->data;
251  *isTwistCmd = false;
252 }
253 }
254 
255 using namespace simulation;
259 int main(int argc, char** argv)
260 {
261 
262  ros::init(argc, argv, "simulation_control");
263  ros::NodeHandle nh;
264  // create parameter variables
265  double loopRate, wheelBase;
266  std::string motionCmdTopic, steeringCmdTopic, motorCmdTopic, odomTopic,
267  odomFrameID, odomChildFrameID, imuTopic;
268  // fetch parameters from ros param server
269  fetchLoopRate(&nh, loopRate);
270  fetchWheelBase(&nh, wheelBase);
271  fetchMotionCommandTopic(&nh, motionCmdTopic);
272  fetchSteeringCommandTopic(&nh, steeringCmdTopic);
273  fetchMotorCommandTopic(&nh, motorCmdTopic);
274  fetchOdomTopic(&nh, odomTopic);
275  fetchOdomFrameID(&nh, odomFrameID);
276  fetchOdomChildFrameID(&nh, odomChildFrameID);
277  fetchImuTopic(&nh, imuTopic);
278  // get current time and configure our car model simulation
279  ros::Time currentTime = ros::Time::now();
280  CarModel car(wheelBase, currentTime);
281 
282  std::vector<double> simPose;
283  twist_msg motionCmd;
284  int steeringCmd, motorCmd;
285  bool isTwistCmd = true;
286  tf::TransformBroadcaster odom_broadcaster;
287  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped odom_trans;
288  odom_msg odom;
289  imu_msg imu;
290 
291  ros::Subscriber motionControl = nh.subscribe<twist_msg>(
292  motionCmdTopic, 10,
293  boost::bind(motionCommand, _1, &motionCmd, &isTwistCmd));
294  ros::Subscriber steeringControl = nh.subscribe<int16_msg>(
295  steeringCmdTopic, 1,
296  boost::bind(steeringCommand, _1, &steeringCmd, &isTwistCmd));
297  ros::Subscriber motorControl = nh.subscribe<int16_msg>(
298  motorCmdTopic, 1, boost::bind(motorCommand, _1, &motorCmd, &isTwistCmd));
299  ros::Publisher odomPub = nh.advertise<odom_msg>(odomTopic, 10);
300  ros::Publisher imuPub = nh.advertise<imu_msg>(imuTopic, 10);
301 
302  // Loop starts here:
303  ros::Rate loop_rate(loopRate);
304  while (ros::ok())
305  {
306  currentTime = ros::Time::now();
307  if (isTwistCmd == false)
308  {
309  simPose = *car.getUpdate(-steeringCmd / 20, motorCmd / 50, currentTime);
310  }
311  else
312  {
313  simPose = *car.getUpdateTwist(motionCmd, currentTime);
314  }
315 
316  geometry_msgs::Quaternion odom_quat =
317  tf::createQuaternionMsgFromYaw(simPose[2]);
318 
319  // first, we'll publish the transform over tf
320 
321  odom_trans.header.stamp = currentTime;
322  odom_trans.header.frame_id = odomFrameID;
323  odom_trans.child_frame_id = odomChildFrameID;
324 
325  odom_trans.transform.translation.x = simPose[1];
326  odom_trans.transform.translation.y = -simPose[0];
327  odom_trans.transform.translation.z = 0.0;
328  odom_trans.transform.rotation = odom_quat;
329  // send the transform
330  odom_broadcaster.sendTransform(odom_trans);
331 
332  // next, we'll publish the odometry message over ROS
333  odom.header.stamp = currentTime;
334  odom.header.frame_id = odomFrameID;
335  // set the position
336  odom.pose.pose.position.x = simPose[1];
337  odom.pose.pose.position.y = -simPose[0];
338  odom.pose.pose.position.z = 0.0;
339  odom.pose.pose.orientation = odom_quat;
340  // set the velocity
341  odom.child_frame_id = odomChildFrameID;
342  odom.twist.twist.linear.x = car.getVx();
343  odom.twist.twist.linear.y = car.getVy();
344  odom.twist.twist.angular.z = car.getAngularVelocity();
345 
346  // create imu sensor message
347  imu.header.stamp = currentTime;
348  imu.header.frame_id = "robot_simulation";
349  imu.angular_velocity.z = car.getAngularVelocity();
350  imu.linear_acceleration.x = car.getAx();
351  imu.linear_acceleration.y = car.getAy();
352 
353  // publish the messages
354  odomPub.publish(odom);
355  imuPub.publish(imu);
356 
357  ros::spinOnce();
358  loop_rate.sleep();
359  }
360 
361  ros::spin();
362 }
